Since you're manually packaging the license file, please add a comment about the `license_file` line that says something like:

```
# License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/dgovil/PySignal/pull/11
```

I've opened a PR at https://github.com/dgovil/PySignal/pull/11. If this gets merged or there is some other change to include the license file in the source distribution, this comment in the recipe will be a reminder to check if it's included in future releases.
oops, I see this has already been merged. I'll copy this as an issue in the feedstock.
